GLOBAL.placeholder_observacion: E.g: The document has not been approved for this reason...

ERROR.general: The request could not be satisfied
ERROR.401: Authorization is not possible, has failed or has not yet been provided
ERROR.403: The server refuses to respond because the client does not have the appropriate privileges
ERROR.405: The request was made using an unsupported application method
ERROR.408: You have exceeded the time limit in returning answer
ERROR.409: The request could not be processed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource
ERROR.rol_insuficiente_titulo: The user does not have permissions
ERROR.rol_insuficiente: The user does not have sufficient permissions to use the system .

notas.no_datos_captura_notas: No data were found for the period or search performed.
notas.sin_calendario: No calendar found for this period
notas.fecha_examen: Grades' register for Last cut or Tests
notas.fuera_fechas: You are trying to access the grades' register outside the established dates
notas.falta_actividad_calificacion: Grades activities are not fully defined
notas.sin_calendario_nivel: There is no calendar for this level or it is not active
notas.sin_calendario_periodo: No calendar for the specified period
notas.sin_corte1: The First Cut has not been defined
notas.sin_corte2: The Second Cut has not been defined
notas.sin_examen: The Last Cut has not been defined
notas.sin_habilit: The Habilitations has not been defined
notas.sin_espacios_academicos: No academic spaces related to the teacher are found
notas.sin_informacion_docente_asignatura: The information related to the teacher or the subject has not been found
notas.sin_info_porcentajes: The information related to the percentages could not be obtained
notas.porcentajes_creados: The academic space did not have a definition of percentages but now they have been created!
notas.porcentajes_creados_info: The assigned percentages are proposed, these can be changed as long as it is within the established dates.
notas.porcentajes_actualizados: The definition of percentages has been successfully updated! Please save the grading table again to ensure the percentage change in student grades.
notas.guardar_cambios_porcentajes: The changes in the percentages will be saved overwriting the previous values, are you sure about the change?
notas.sin_calificaciones_estudiantes: Unable to obtain information related to student grades
notas.notas_estudiantes_creados: The academic space did not have a record of grades for the students but now they have been created!
notas.notas_estudiantes_actualizado: Student grades have been successfully modified!
notas.guardar_cambios_notas: The changes in the grades will be saved overwriting the previous values, are you sure about the change?
notas.notas_mal_digitadas: There are badly typed grades, please check them and correct the errors.
notas.cancelar_cambios: Any changes you have made to the grades that have not yet been saved will be lost. Are you sure?
notas.cancelar_cambios_generarPDF: Ensuring the integrity of the data, unsaved changes are undone; The last saved grades are taken for the report, if you have made changes please save them before generating the report.
notas.no_datos_estados_registros: No academic spaces assigned to teachers were found for this period
notas.cerrar_corte_notas: A grade cut is going to close! Keep in mind that once closed you will not be able to edit again unless you request an extemporaneous modification.
notas.info_finalizar: About to finish the registration of grades, please fill in the fields of absences and observations if you haven't already done so. The foregoing in order to evaluate cases of subject losses due to absences.
notas.pregunta_finalizar_registros: Do you want to end the qualification process? You can press cancel to save changes and review the final notes, if you have already made the pertinent revisions, press accept to conclude the process.
notas.info_guardado_necesario: Teacher: Every time you make changes to percentages, it is recommended that you save the grade table again to ensure the change in percentages in the students' grades.
notas.modificacion_extemporanea_Corte1: You are entering out-of-date notes for cutoff 1.

asignaturas.no_datos_notas: No data were found for the asignature
